6.title: Evie Harris' Cabaret Showcase
6.plot: When lady reporter Damiana Garcia interviews aging Hollywood actress Evie Harris about her upcoming comeback cabaret showcase, she gets more than she bargained for. Damiana discovers upon arrival that Evie's still in bed recovering from last night's bender - and things go downhill from there...

imdb.plot outline: Lady reporter Damiana Garcia interviews all sorts of people and has wild journalistic adventures in her 'Damiana Files.' This new collection features Damiana solving a mystery, emceeing an LGBT Pride parade, and having an exclusive interview with 'Madonna' herself!
imdb.title: The Damiana Files
plot: Reporter Damiana Garcia always gets the story on fascinating and newsworthy people with her hard-hitting reports.::Anonymous
